channel.title: My servers advertisement was deleted?
channel.description: My advertisement for Dodian XIV got deleted. We had it up since march, had 2000+ votes, and have even bought mopar sponsorship. I would like to request for it to be restored, or at least a reason as to why it was deleted. We never violated the terms, and all of our votes were legit.

item.title: My servers advertisement was deleted?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Besides breaking rules, the only reason a server is ever deleted is if itâ€™s % uptime drops below 40%.

edit:
Or, as it turns out, a staff member accidentally hits the ban or delete button (there is no way for them to unban or undelete). Sorry about that, I have restored it manually. Also, the link in your signature is wrong

Read full topic
